meanings.definition: A person who causes suffering or distress to others.
meanings.sent1: The tormenters at school made fun of the new student.
meanings.sent2: The community stood up against the tormenters who bullied others.
meanings.sent3: The tormenters in the movie were defeated by the hero in the end.
meanings.sent4: The tormenters of happiness were driven away by acts of kindness.
meanings.sent5: The tormenters in the story were portrayed as villains with no remorse.

meanings.definition: Those who inflict pain or anguish on others.
meanings.sent1: The tormenters in the haunted house scared the visitors with their tricks.
meanings.sent2: The tormenters of the forest were rumored to be mythical creatures.
meanings.sent3: The tormenters in the game were challenging but fun to defeat.
meanings.sent4: The tormenters of the mind whispered doubts and fears into her thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The tormenters of the night haunted his dreams with eerie visions.
